column2: Super-Duty Traction Bar Kit
column3:
Super Duty Traction Bar Kit

Enhance your vehicle's performance with our Super Duty Traction Bar Kit, engineered from premium materials for unbeatable strength and durability. Whether you're off-roading, towing, or pushing your rig to the limit, this kit provides superior traction and control.

Kit Includes:

  • 1 Pair of Traction Bars (Precisely CNC laser-cut from 3/16" steel, featuring overlays on both the inside and outside of the bars in your choice of milled aluminum or sleek mirrored stainless steel)
  • 1 Pair of Traction Bar Brackets frame side (Available in milled aluminum or mirrored stainless steel overlay to suit your vehicle's performance needs and style)
  • 1 Pair of Traction Bar Brackets (Mounted on the bottom of the lower U-bolt brackets for added stability and secure fit)
  • All necessary hardware for installation, including Grade 8 SAE bolts for maximum strength and durability
  • 2-Piece PTFE Heim Joints for smooth, long-lasting articulation

Features:

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Traction bars are CNC laser-cut from 3/16" steel, with overlays on both the inside and outside of the bars for a sleek look and added protection.
  • High-Quality Materials: Choose between precision-milled aluminum or the durable mirrored stainless steel overlay for a premium finish that complements your vehicle.
  • Premium Hardware: All bolts are Grade 8 SAE for exceptional strength, while overlay bolts are stainless steel for corrosion resistance and a polished appearance.
  • Enhanced Traction & Stability: Reduces axle wrap and improves rear-end control, ensuring your vehicle maintains power and stability in tough conditions.
  • Smooth Operation: PTFE Heim joints deliver smooth articulation, reducing friction and ensuring consistent performance over time.
  • Complete Kit: Includes all the hardware you need for easy installation—no extra parts required.

Upgrade your ride with the Super Duty Traction Bar Kit, designed for high-performance durability, ultimate traction, and a custom look that stands out.

column2: Ford Super Duty Coil Plate With Resi Clamp
column3:
Upgrade your Ford Super Duty’s suspension with our Coil Plate With Resi Clamp, a complete kit designed to enhance both the style and functionality of your truck’s coil springs. This kit combines our heavy-duty coil plates with integrated billet reservoir clamps for a sleek, professional look and optimal shock performance.

Features:

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Fabricated from 3/16" laser-cut steel, delivering exceptional strength and longevity.
  • Integrated Billet Reservoir Clamp: CNC-milled from high-quality billet aluminum, designed to securely accommodate 2.0" and 2.5" shock remote reservoirs, eliminating the need for hose clamps.
  • Precision Fit: Designed specifically for Ford Super Duty models to ensure seamless installation.

What’s Included:

  • Two (2) Coil Plates
  • Two (2) Integrated Billet Reservoir Clamps (fits 2.0" and 2.5" reservoirs)
  • Complete Stainless Installation Hardware

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).
  • Works seamlessly with both factory and aftermarket coil springs and shock reservoirs.

column2: Ford Super Duty 4.5"-10" Fabricated Radius Arm Lift Kit
column3:
Upgrade your Ford Super Duty with our 4.5" - 10" Fabricated Radius Arm Lift Kit, built for strength, performance, and customization. This kit is compatible with 2005–2024 Ford Super Duty models and offers a modular approach to meet your lift height requirements.

Base Kit Includes

  • Front Fabricated Radius Arms
  • Caster Adjustable Radius Arms
  • Radius Arm Overlays
  • Top Coil Plate with Overlay
  • Track Bar Bracket
  • Drop-Down Pitman Arm
  • Sway Bar Drop-Down Brackets
  • Rear Blocks with Overlays
  • U-Bolts
  • All Necessary Hardware

6" Version Adds

  • Adjustable Track Bar

8" Version Adds

  • Index Ring Kit
  • Extended Sway Bar Links

10" Version Adds

  • Stacked Leveling Kit 

Designed for both on- and off-road applications, this kit ensures optimal suspension geometry, superior durability, and an aggressive stance. Bolt-on installation makes upgrading your Super Duty hassle-free.

column2: Ford Super Duty Fabricated Radius Arms
column3:
Ford Super Duty Fabricated Radius Arms

Overview:
Upgrade your Ford Super Duty with our Fabricated Radius Arms, designed to deliver superior strength and improved suspension geometry. These radius arms provide enhanced stability, better alignment retention, and a bold, custom look for your truck.

Key Features:

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Fabricated from 1/4" fully boxed and laser-cut steel, welded for exceptional strength and durability.
  • Caster Adjustment: Designed to allow lifts from 4.5" to 10" without the use of drop-down brackets, ensuring precise alignment and improved suspension geometry.
  • RockJock’s Chromoly Johnny Joints: Equipped with weld-on chromoly Johnny Joints featuring zerk fittings for easy greasing and extended service life.
  • Bolt-On Installation: Direct-fit design utilizing factory mounting points for a secure and hassle-free installation.
  • Premium Accessories: Your choice of milled aluminum or sleek mirrored stainless steel

Compatibility:
Fits all 2005+ Ford F250 and F350 models without the use of drop-down brackets. Compatible with various lift kits and aftermarket suspension systems.

Package Includes:

  • 2 x Fabricated Radius Arms
  • 4 x Layovers with Stainless Hardware
  • 2 x Caster Bolts

Additional Notes:

  • Ready for paint or powder coat to match your build’s style.
  • Alignment is necessary after installation, as with all suspension modifications.
  • Designed and manufactured in the USA.

Order Now:
Enhance your truck’s performance and appearance with our Ford Super Duty Fabricated Radius Arms. Add to your cart today or contact us for more details!

column2: Ford Super Duty 2.5 Inch Level Puck With Resi Clamp
column3:
Elevate your Ford Super Duty’s stance and functionality with our 2.5 Inch Level Puck With Resi Clamp. Designed to provide a perfect front-end lift while offering a secure and professional mounting solution for your shock reservoir, this kit combines durability and precision.

Features:

  • Durable Leveling Puck: Fabricated from 1/4" laser-cut steel, providing a strong and reliable 2.5-inch front lift.
  • Integrated Billet Reservoir Clamp: CNC-milled from high-quality billet aluminum, designed to securely accommodate 2.0" and 2.5" shock remote reservoirs. Eliminates the need for unsightly and unreliable hose clamps.
  • Improved Stance: Levels your truck’s front end for a more aggressive and balanced look.
  • Premium Installation Hardware: Includes stainless steel hardware for superior corrosion resistance and lasting performance.
  • Easy Installation: Bolt-on design for quick and straightforward installation without the need for modifications.

What’s Included:

  • Two (2) 2.5 Inch Steel Leveling Pucks
  • Two (2) Integrated Billet Reservoir Clamps (fits 2.0" and 2.5" reservoirs)
  • Complete Stainless Steel Installation Hardware

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).

column2: Ford Super Duty 2.5 Inch Leveling Pucks
column3:
Overview:
Enhance the stance and performance of your Ford Super Duty with our 2.5-inch Leveling Pucks. Designed for durability and precision, these pucks provide the perfect lift to level out your truck’s front end, ensuring a balanced look and improved ground clearance for your adventures.

Key Features:

  • High-Strength Construction: Made from 1/4" laser-cut steel, ensuring exceptional durability and performance under demanding conditions.
  • Precision Fit: Engineered specifically for Ford Super Duty trucks to ensure a seamless and secure fit.
  • Improved Ground Clearance: Adds 2.5 inches of lift to the front end, enabling the installation of larger tires and enhancing off-road capability.
  • Simple Installation: Bolt-on design requires no cutting or welding, making the installation process quick and straightforward.

Compatibility:
Fits all 2005+ Ford F250 and F350 models. Ideal for trucks requiring a leveled stance and moderate lift.

Package Includes:

  • 2 x 2.5 Inch Leveling Pucks
  • Installation Hardware Kit
  • Your choice of milled aluminum or sleek mirrored stainless steel

Additional Notes:

  • Alignment is recommended after installation to ensure optimal performance.
  • Made in the USA with premium craftsmanship.

Order Now:
Level up your Ford Super Duty today! Add these 2.5-inch Leveling Pucks to your cart and enjoy a leveled stance with improved performance.

column2: Ford Super Duty Coil Over Conversion Kit
column3:
Transform your Ford Super Duty’s suspension with our Coil Over Conversion Kit, designed to deliver unmatched performance, adjustability, and style. This kit replaces your factory coil spring setup with a high-performance coil-over suspension system, perfect for both on- and off-road applications.

Features:

  • Precision-Engineered Components: Includes heavy-duty brackets and mounts, fabricated from 1/4" laser-cut steel, for exceptional strength and durability.
  • Enhanced Performance: Converts your factory suspension to a coil-over setup, providing improved handling, ride quality, and adjustability.
  • Reservoir Compatibility: Integrated CNC Machined billet aluminum reservoir clamps to securely accommodate 2.0" and 2.5" shock reservoirs, ensuring a clean, professional appearance.
  • Easy Installation: Bolt-on design for straightforward installation.

What’s Included:

  • Coil-Over Mounting Brackets (Upper and Lower)
  • Integrated Billet Reservoir Clamps
  • Complete Installation Hardware

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).
  • Designed to work seamlessly with most aftermarket coil-over shocks. (1.5" mounting width)

column2: Ford Super Duty Coil Over Conversion Dual Resi Clamp
column3:
Take your Ford Super Duty’s suspension game to the next level (and then some) with our Coil Over Conversion Kit featuring Dual Resi Clamps. Perfect for those who demand peak performance—or just want to flex on their buddies. This kit not only transforms your factory suspension into a high-performance coil-over setup but also provides room for TWO reservoirs per side, because one reservoir is never enough when bragging rights are on the line.

Features:

  • Precision-Engineered Components: Includes heavy-duty brackets and mounts, fabricated from 1/4" laser-cut steel, ensuring exceptional strength and durability.
  • Dual Reservoir Clamps: CNC-milled billet aluminum clamps securely accommodate two 2.0" or 2.5" shock reservoirs per side—because nothing says serious performance like double the reservoirs.
  • Enhanced Performance: Converts your factory suspension to a coil-over setup, delivering improved handling, ride quality, and adjustability.
  • Bragging Rights Guaranteed: Your truck will not only handle better but also look like a serious contender, whether you’re tackling trails or dominating parking lot conversations.
  • Easy Installation: Bolt-on design ensures a straightforward installation.

What’s Included:

  • Coil-Over Mounting Brackets (Upper and Lower)
  • 2 x Integrated Billet Dual Reservoir Clamps 
  • Complete Installation Hardware

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).
  • Designed to work seamlessly with most aftermarket coil-over shocks and remote reservoirs (1.5" coil over mounting width).
  • Please note we do not stock these billet clamps and we only mill them depending on orders, expected lead time might be longer than usual, feel free to contact us for more details on schedule.

column2: Ford Super Duty Steering Stabilizer Kit
column3:
Take control of your Ford Super Duty’s steering with our Steering Stabilizer Kit, designed to reduce steering vibrations and improve handling on and off the road. Whether you’re battling rough terrain or oversized tires, this kit ensures a smoother, more controlled driving experience.

Features:

  • Precision-Engineered Brackets: Fabricated from 1/4" laser-cut steel for unmatched strength and durability.
  • Enhanced Stability: Minimizes steering shimmy and improves overall control, especially with larger tires or rough terrain.
  • Universal Fit for Stabilizers: Compatible with most single and dual stabilizer configurations, offering flexibility for your needs.
  • Bolt-On Installation: Easy to install with no major modifications required.

What’s Included:

  • Mounting Brackets and Hardware
  • Complete Installation Hardware
  • No U-Bolt Brackets

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).
  • Works seamlessly with factory and aftermarket suspension systems.

column2: Ford Super Duty Sway Bar Drop Down Bracket
column3:
Overview: Improve the performance and alignment of your truck's sway bar with our Drop Down Brackets. Designed for lifted trucks, these brackets restore proper sway bar geometry, ensuring smoother handling and enhanced stability both on-road and off-road.

Key Features:

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Made from 3/16" laser-cut steel for unparalleled strength and durability.
  • Precision Design: Provides the correct drop for sway bars in lifted applications, preventing premature wear and optimizing performance.
  • Simple Installation: Bolt-on design ensures quick and secure mounting without the need for extensive modifications.
  • Compatibility: Suitable for a wide range of lift heights (2"- 6")

Package Includes:

  • 2 x Sway Bar Drop Down Brackets
  • Installation Hardware Kit

Additional Notes:

  • Recommended for trucks with suspension lifts of 2 inches or more.
  • Made in the USA with premium craftsmanship.

Order Now: Ensure optimal sway bar performance with our Drop Down Brackets. Add them to your cart today or contact us for more information!

column2: Ford Alumiduty Frame Plate Kit
column3:
Transform your Ford Super Duty’s appearance with our Frame Plate Kit, designed to add a sleek, custom look to your truck’s frame. Featuring high-quality materials and precision craftsmanship, this kit delivers an unmatched level of detail and style to your build.

Features:

  • Dual-Layer Construction: Plates are made from 1/8″ laser-cut steel, dressed with your choice of mirrored stainless steel or 3/16″ aluminum layovers for a striking and polished finish.
  • Custom Fit: Engineered specifically for Ford Super Duty models (2017-2024), ensuring seamless installation and perfect alignment.
  • Premium Hardware: Includes stainless steel hardware for a clean, professional, and lasting installation.

What’s Included:

  • Rear Wheel Well Plates: Two (2) Steel Plates and Two (2) Layovers (your choice of style)
  • Front of Coil Bucket Plates: Two (2) Steel Plates and Two (2) Layovers (your choice of style)

Fitment:

column2: Ford Super Duty High Steer Truss System
column3:
Upgrade your Ford Super Duty’s suspension and steering with our High Steer Truss System, designed for extreme lift setups and demanding off-road applications. This system offers unparalleled durability, precise steering control, and improved geometry for high-performance vehicles.

Features:

  • High-Strength Construction: Fabricated from 1/4" laser-cut steel and 1/4" wall DOM tubing for exceptional durability in tough environments.
  • Optimized Geometry: Improves steering geometry for trucks with 10"-16" and 18"-24" lift kits.
  • Direct Bolt-On Installation: The truss is designed for a direct bolt-on application, requiring no drilling or welding for a hassle-free installation.
  • Track Bar Relocation: Replaces the factory track bar (pan hard bar) with a fully adjustable heim joint track bar for improved alignment and adjustability.
  • Adjustable Steering Components: Includes a fully adjustable DOM tube drag link and tie rod bar for complete steering customization.
  • Enhanced Stability: Features a lower truss brace that doubles as a dual steering stabilizer mount, ensuring maximum rigidity and control.
  • Billet Components: Includes billet steering stabilizer mounts for a clean, professional finish.
  • High-Performance Hardware: Equipped with 2-piece PTFE 1.25" heims and Grade 8 hardware for ultimate strength and reliability.
  • Customizable Design: Comes with a bolt-on truss featuring your choice of overlay to match your build.
  • Steering Upgrades: Includes a double-shear pitman arm and a high-steer passenger-side knuckle (requires a core) for superior performance.

What’s Included:

  • Bolt-On Truss (with overlay options)
  • Adjustable DOM Tube Track Bar (heim joint design)
  • Adjustable DOM Tube Drag Link
  • Adjustable DOM Tube Tie Rod Bar
  • Lower Truss Brace (dual steering stabilizer mount)
  • Billet Steering Stabilizer Mounts
  • Grade 8 Installation Hardware
  • Double-Shear Pitman Arm
  • High-Steer Passenger-Side Knuckle (core required)

Additional Requirements:

  • Upper Coil Over Mounts: Required for proper installation.
  • Special Note for 2005-2016 Models: If you have a 2005-2016 Super Duty, please contact us, as different coil buckets are necessary to make this kit work.

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty trucks equipped with extreme lift kits (10"-16" and 18"-24").

Additional Notes:

  • Professional alignment is recommended after installation.
  • Made in the USA with premium craftsmanship and materials.

Order Now:

Enhance your Ford Super Duty with our High Steer Truss System—a complete solution for improved handling, unmatched durability, and optimized steering performance.

column2: Ford Super Duty Mini Cradle
column3:
The Ford Super Duty Mini Cradle is the same high-quality component featured in our Long Arm 4-Link Kit. Designed for superior strength and functionality, this cradle is a must-have for serious off-road enthusiasts and heavy-duty truck owners.

  • Material: Crafted from 1/4" laser-cut steel for unparalleled durability and strength.
  • Fitment: Engineered for a perfect fit on Ford Super Duty models, seamlessly integrating with your frame.
  • Hardware Included: Comes complete with hardware to mount securely on the frame.
  • OEM Guides: The cradle uses OEM bolt holes as guides, with through-drilling of the frame required for proper installation.
  • Crossmember: Includes a heavy-duty crossmember to tie the assembly together, ensuring maximum stability.
  • Floating Arm Design: Mounts the arms and rear traction bars inside the frame, creating a unique floating arm effect for improved clearance and a sleek appearance.
  • Customization: Choose your overlay—mirrored stainless or machined aluminum—to match your truck’s style.

Built for tough environments, this Mini Cradle provides the strength and reliability you need for demanding applications. Pair it with our Long Arm 4-Link Kit for a complete suspension upgrade that delivers unmatched performance.

For assistance with determining the correct arm lengths based on your existing lift height, contact us—we’re happy to help!

column2: Ford Super Duty Rear Lift Blocks
column3:
Ford Super Duty Rear Lift Blocks

Upgrade your Ford Super Duty’s suspension with our Rear Lift Blocks, designed to provide additional lift while maintaining factory ride quality and performance. Perfect for leveling or lifting the rear of your truck, these blocks are engineered to handle tough conditions and improve driveline geometry.

Features:

  • Heavy-Duty Construction: Fabricated from high-strength 1/4" laser cut steel for exceptional durability and performance.
  • Tapered Design: Blocks are tapered rearward to improve rear axle driveline angle, reducing stress on components and enhancing drivability.
  • Corrosion-Resistant Finish: Coated to protect against rust and wear, ensuring long-lasting reliability.
  • Precision Fit: Designed specifically for Ford Super Duty models, ensuring seamless compatibility with factory suspension.
  • Improved Stance: Provides lift to level your truck or compensate for additional rear-end weight.
  • Complete Solution: Includes U-bolts, hardware, and rear overlays for a comprehensive installation package.

What’s Included:

  • Two (2) Tapered Rear Lift Blocks
  • Four (4) Extended U Bolts with 5/8" or 3/4" thread diameter (select when ordering)
  • Complete Installation Hardware
  • Rear Overlays

Fitment:

  • Compatible with Ford Super Duty models (2005-2024).
  • Note pre 2011 models might need a U- Bolt flip kit
  • Select lift height and thread diameter (5/8" or 3/4") to ensure proper fit and performance.

column3:
Traction Bar Brackets (Frame Side) - Pair

Key Features:

  • Universal Fitment: Engineered for compatibility with a wide range of truck frames, making them an ideal choice for various applications.

column2: Ford Super Duty U Bolt Traction Bar Brackets
column3:
Ford Super Duty U Bolt Traction Bar Brackets

Overview: Achieve superior stability and enhanced suspension performance with our Ford Super Duty U Bolt Traction Bar Brackets. Crafted for heavy-duty applications, this bracket provides a reliable mounting solution for traction bars, ensuring optimal functionality and durability under demanding conditions.

Key Features:

Order Now: Take your vehicle’s performance to the next level. Add the Ford Super Duty U Bolt Traction Bar Brackets to your cart today or contact us for more information!

column2: Ford Super Duty 10"-12" Inch Long Arm 4 Link Lift Kit
column3:
Upgrade your Ford Super Duty with our 10"-12" Long Arm 4 Link Lift Kit. Engineered for reliable performance on and off the road, this kit provides exceptional strength and stability at an affordable price. Compatible with 2005–2024 Ford Super Duty models, it includes everything you need for a cost-effective suspension enhancement.

Base Kit Includes:

  • Center Cradle Section made with CNC laser cut 1/4" Steel
  • Front 4 Link Bars with layovers 
  • Rear Traction Bars with layovers
  • Center Crossmember for increased structural rigidity
  • Adjustable Track Bar (Pan Hard Bar) for precise axle alignment
  • Lowered Track-Bar Bracket (Pan Hard Bar)
  • Transfer Case Index Ring Kit for proper drivetrain alignment
  • Rear Blocks and Lower Perch for optimized rear lift
  • Top Coil Spacers
  • Extended Front Brake Lines
  • Sway Bar Drop Down Brackets and Extended Sway Bar Links
  • Drop Down Pitman Arm for precise steering control
  • U-Bolts and all necessary installation hardware
  • Choice of Mirrored Stainless or Machined Aluminum Overlays

This kit is designed for enthusiasts who value affordability without compromising durability, functionality, or style. Built with robust materials and precision-crafted components, it ensures your Super Duty performs reliably both on the trail and at the show.

All necessary hardware and detailed instructions are included for a straightforward installation process. Experience a whole new level of capability and style with the Ford Super Duty 10-12 Inch Long Arm 4 Link Lift Kit.

column2: Ford Super Duty 18"-24" Front & Rear 4 Long Arm Lift Kit
column3:
Take your Ford Super Duty to new heights—literally—with our 18-24 Inch Front & Rear 4 Long Arm Lift Kit, the ultimate suspension upgrade for those who demand nothing but the best. Precision-engineered and crafted from CNC laser-cut 1/4" steel, this kit offers superior strength, durability, and performance for even the most extreme applications.

Premium Features:

  • Coil Over Conversion Upper Brackets or Buckets with Billet Resi Mounts(Steel body trucks only)
  • Center Cradle Section designed for maximum rigidity and made from CNC laser-cut 1/4" steel.
  • Heavy-duty Front and Rear 4 Link Bars with layovers for unmatched strength and style.
  • Center Crossmember for enhanced structural integrity and stability.
  • Adjustable Track Bar (Pan Hard Bar) for precise axle alignment and smoother handling.
  • Lowered Track-Bar Bracket to optimize suspension geometry.
  • Transfer Case Index Ring Kit to maintain proper drivetrain alignment.

Enhanced Control and Performance:

  • Extended Front Brake Lines and Rear Brake Lines
  • Fabricated Front Sway Bar with Adjustable Links
  • Dual Shear Pitman Arm for precise and responsive steering.

Designed for the Most Demanding Builds:

  • Steering Stabilizer Brace to reduce vibration and enhance control.
  • Front Bolt-On Axle Truss to reinforce axle strength and longevity.
  • High Steer Billet Knuckle Conversion for superior steering geometry.
  • Heim Joint Track Bar, Tie Rod, and Drag Link for maximum articulation and adjustability.
  • 1 1/4" 2 Piece PTFE Heim joints everywhere
  • Rear 4 Link Bolt-On Truss for increased rear axle strength.
  • 3-Piece Rear Bracketry for Coil Over Conversion to ensure a secure fit.
  • Fabricated Front Sway Bar with Billet mounts.
  • Front Driveshaft to handle the added lift and power transfer seamlessly.
  • Optional Remote Shock Option (Front & Rear)

Unmatched Style and Strength:

  • Choice of Mirrored Stainless or Machined Aluminum Overlays for a custom, polished look.

This kit is not just a suspension upgrade; it’s a statement. Whether you're conquering the most challenging trails or showcasing your truck at a premium event, this lift kit ensures your Ford Super Duty stands above the rest in both performance and style. Built for 2005–2024 Ford Super Duty models.

column2: Ford Super Duty Fabricated Sway Bar Kit
column3:
Take your Ford Super Duty’s suspension to the next level with our Fabricated Sway Bar Kit. Engineered for superior handling and stability, this kit is ideal for trucks with lifted or modified suspensions, delivering exceptional performance in demanding driving conditions.

Features:

  • Precision Fabrication: Made from 1/4″ thick-wall DOM tubing and 1/4″ CNC laser-cut arms for unmatched strength and durability.
  • Two-Piece Billet Clamps: Bolt directly to existing frame mounting points, featuring Zerk fittings for easy greasing and service.
  • Enhanced Performance: Reduces body roll and improves cornering stability for a smoother, more controlled ride.
  • Customizable Layovers: Includes your choice of machined and milled aluminum or mirrored stainless steel inside and outside layovers for a personalized finish.
  • Direct Fit Design: Bolt-on installation with all hardware included—no modifications required.
